product.longDescription:
4 KIX 2.0 Carry On Spinner is perfect for a 1-3 day trip, this little guy has everything you need to make your quick getaway stress free and fun!
• Sturdy handling with our ergonomic carbon fiber texture trolley grip that adjusts to you size.
• Roll confidently with our wear and tear tested ball wheel.
• It delivers maximum stability and comfort.
• Smooth operator for hands of all kinds, our large zipper pulls are effortless to use
• Rugged polyester with carbon fiber trim accents and gunmetal hardware creates a subtle and sophisticated finished look
• Max-capacity interior, including a modesty pocket, mesh zipped door pocket, and elastic tie tapes
• Case expands 1"
• Weight: 7.5 lbs.

Body Dimensions: 20.5" x 14.0" x 7.5"
Overall Dimensions: 23.5" x 14.5" x 9.5"
